name: tabz-chrome
description: TabzChrome plugins - browser automation, terminal management, multi-session orchestration

plugins.name: conductor
plugins.description: Orchestrate multi-session Claude workflows - spawn agents, kill terminals, send prompts via tmux

plugins.name: tabz-mcp
plugins.description: Browser automation via Tabz MCP tools - tabs, screenshots, clicks, forms, network capture

plugins.name: xterm-js
plugins.description: xterm.js terminal emulator patterns - React integration, WebSocket, state management

plugins.name: ctthandoff
plugins.description: Generate a handoff summary, copy to clipboard, and speak via Tabz TTS

plugins.name: discover-profiles
plugins.description: Scan system for CLI tools and generate TabzChrome profile configurations

plugins.name: rebuild
plugins.description: Build the TabzChrome extension and copy to Windows for Chrome reload

plugins.name: tabz-integration
plugins.description: Integration guide for connecting projects to TabzChrome terminals

plugins.name: tabz-chrome-full
plugins.description: Everything - all skills, commands, agents, hooks, and MCP server
